author: Dark Helmet
description: Back in May, we talked about a change that Nintendo made to its EULA that essentially amounted to “We’ll brick your console if we don’t like how you use it.” Now, Nintendo will tell you that the changes were done to protect the company from the threat of piracy. The problem is that’s not what […]
title: Nintendo Is Already Punishing Switch 2 Users Over Piracy ‘Suspicions’
